name: Custom Entry
description: Manual Entry. Determine your scores yourself and enter them here. Values must be between 1 and 20. If you are entering numbers that you have rolled yourself, do NOT apply any bonuses to them from your race, your feats, or any other source. Bonus will be added later.

name: Dice Roll
description: Roll 3d6 or more for each ability. The sums of the three highest dice values per roll are your ability scores. With four dice per roll, this method is the official method for randomizing a character's attributes.

name: Point Buy
description: You have 27 points with which to buy attributes. Scores of up to 8 are free. Scores of up to 13 cost 1 point per value over 8, i.e. a 9 costs 1 point, a 10 costs 2 points, an 11 costs 3 points, etc. Scores over 13 cost twice as much per value, i.e. a 14 costs 7 points (5 for each value over 8 up to 13, plus 2 more points to increase the score to 14), a 15 costs 9 points, etc. Ability scores cannot exceed 15 with this method.
